fields.name: Furry Friends (Passive):
fields.value: You are constantly aware of the identities all players with animal-themed roles. Your abilities may only target these players.

fields.name: Shelter (3x, Charge 50%):
fields.value: Your target will be roleblocked, and all visits to them will fail tonight.

fields.name: Feed (2x, Charge 60%):
fields.value: Your target will gain a 10% score boost the coming evening.

fields.name: Groom (1x, Charge 70%):
fields.value: Your target will gain roleblock immunity tonight, and any investigative actions targeting them will fail.

fields.name: Pawsitive Presence (Passive):
fields.value: You may use multiple abilities in one night, provided they all target the same player. This only counts as one visit. Additionally, you are immune to roleblocks.

fields.name: Learning the Language (Passive):
fields.value: You may not open a Hello Neighbor with any player with an animal-themed role until the second time you place in the top half, at which point you may open two hello neighbors each night.

fields.name: Win Condition:
fields.value: * Survive to see any player with an animal-themed role win.
